title: Betfair23
author: Betfair23
content: you don't have time to create email for your stuff Here I bring you a complete store of all types of email I am selling Gmail and hotmail and yahoo and protonmail the min order is 5 units They can be used from any IP or country without problems5 emails : 2.5€10 emails : 5€20 emails : 10€30 emails : 15€40 emails : 20€50 emails : 25€

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: These types of services increase spam/scams. Because you are providing everything with a small cost. And by providing the cost spammer will get a lot of email IDs by which s/he will send bulk emails which is spam and spam occurs for what? Spam occurs for scamming!

And by providing the cost spammer will get a lot of email IDs by which s/he will send bulk emails which is spam and spam occurs for what? Spam occurs for scamming!not all people are spam or scam here

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Betfair23 on October 13, 2023, 06:44:43 PMnot all people are spam or scam here You are right that all people are not spammers and scammers. But all the spammers buy such types of accounts and send bulk messages which is phishing which is used to steal funds/passwords various accounts access and so on.
